name: Oleksii Kachan
title: Full Stack Software Engineer & Graphic Designer
introduction: Hello there! Welcome to my space...
My passion about IT industry is to help businesses to focus on customers & community. I do it by creating different types of affordable enterprise software (e.g. MES, ERP, CRM solutions).
I am sure that technologies are not as important as concepts & principles behind those technologies.

projectDescription.content: In tight collaboration with |bold|Candy Digital|-| I was working on a project for Spotify. The goal was to create a solution to automate marketing banners production process. In terms of measurable goals we had to reduce production time and effort.
I had a team of 4 people (including me). I took a couple of roles in this team: |italic|Designer, Project Manager, Lead Developer|-|.

Based on |italic|Spotify's|-| prcoesses descriptions I created |bold|low-fidelity prototype|-| in |italic|Figma|-|. After it being approved I started designing |bold|high-fidelity prototype|-|. At the final point we decided to leave prototype without changes, so it was a |bold|Final UI|-|.
I defined the following development workflow

The main |bold|problem|-| was to create a |italic|photoshop-like|-| tool to design banners. On the image you can see the result of solving this problem - light-weight photoshop-like tool to design banners with predefined sizes.

|italic|AGW|-| software addresses the challenges of |bold|workflow automation, real-time data collection, system integration|-| and business insight. It offers scalable, high-performance, reliable and |bold|flexible solutions|-| that meet the demand of intelligent process automation for manufacturers, 3PLs, distributors and other spheres of business.

Ranging a wide set of solutions from a small tailored operator support systems or system integration platforms to powerful business decision-making support environments AGW offers scalable execution network for enterprise.

|italic|AGW IP|-| is a complex manufacturing environment that deals with significant volumes of heterogeneous design and production data. Efficient collection, consolidation, transformation and delivery of these data in secure and timely manner is a key task of manufacturing IT on the way of organization towards |bold|cloud infrastructure|-|.

|italic|AGW MES|-| is an |bold|ISA95|-| compliant |bold|web-based product|-| that provides a broad and flexible platform to optimize manufacturing operations. From simple to complex operations, |italic|AGW MES|-| manages the entire build process from start to finish providing operators detailed step-by-step directions and controlling their completion. |bold|Visualization|-| capabilities give you |bold|real-time visibility|-| and historical analytics over all manufacturing operations, enabling you to improve throughput, quality, agility and compliance. |italic|AGW MES|-| is a powerful, flexible and scalable |bold|Manufacturing Execution System|-| that is easily expanded with business requirements to maximize performance.

|italic|AGW WMS|-| provides control and visibility of your inventory from the time you receive a shipment until finished goods leave your warehouse. |italic|AGW WMS|-| is designed to |bold|optimize movement|-| of your inventory across your facility. From materials receiving down through the manufacturing process until packing and shipping to the customer |italic|AGW WMS|-| helps to direct your inventory in an optimal way providing |bold|up-to-the-minute information|-| on the quantity, location, status, and history of every item including work-in-process and finished goods.
The project work consisted of two parallel streams: development and support.

list: Overriding / Supporting legacy code (transferring one of the services from ASP.NET Forms to ASP.NET MVC)
Implementing different settings storage methods (as xml configuration, as database entity)
Configuring & Deploying system on customer's side
Implementing 'on demand' customer-specific features (batch loading, specific production routing)

projects.title: TDM (Tools Data Manager). Manufacturing data collection and management solution

projectDescription.content: |italic|Tools Data Manager ("TDM")|-| is an advanced manufacturing data collection and management solution that features comprehensive functionality for |bold|torque data capture|-| and management. |italic|TDM|-| is designed to simplify the challenge of connecting, extracting, associating, archiving, analyzing and mobilizing manufacturing data generated by localized shop-floor devices; such as, torque assembly systems, process PLCs, testing systems such as Labview, quality systems and etc. From |bold|quality & test data|-| to critical process data, |italic|TDM|-| aggregates all disparate localized manufacturing data into a single, central database and operating tool offering total control and collaboration.

|italic|TDM|-| is one of the first commercially designed software tools that integrates the function of |bold|device connectivity|-| into the core software tool including connectivity, data selection, data identity and many other useful functions.
The project work consisted of two parallel streams: development and support.

list: Configuring & Deploying system on customer's side
Implementing 'on demand' customer-specific features (implement agw-like routing)

projectDescription.content: |bold|Hyperloop|-| is a conceptual, high-speed transportation system initially proposed by |bold|Elon Musk|-|. The concept consists of passenger and cargo pods being propelled at up to 760 mph in a low pressure tube using sustainable and cost-efficient energy. To accelerate its development, |bold|SpaceX|-| is hosted a competition for engineering teams to |bold|design|-| their own hyperloop pods and test them at their facility in |italic|Hawthorne, California|-|.
rLoop is |bold|open-sourced|-|, |bold|crowd-sourced|-| & |bold|crowd-funded|-| |italic|community|-|. I was a member of 2 teams: |bold|Systems Team|-| & |bold|Software Team|-|.

list: Leading small team < 5 people of designers & developers on UI/UX
Writing Human-Machine Interface section for Telemetry and Control stations in System Design Document (SDD)

projectDescription.content: I researched our processes and defined the sets of trackable data. Based on that I developed low-fidelity mock-ups.

projects.title: Landing Page Design for agricultural machinery parts reseller

projectDescription.content: Company started it's way on digitalization and I was responsible for representation on the Internet inmprovement. After interviews with the company I desided to redesign company's brand site. Unfortunatelly, project is on pause due to other higher company's priorities.
My very first branding project was creating a brand for myself. I defined 2 main colors, created logo, designed 2-side business card.
I created 4 types of logo: |italic|horizontal, vertical, square and portrait|-|. Each of them exist in 2 versions: |bold|dark & light|-| (based on defined brand colors).

After finishing logo I switched to |bold|business card|-| design. I do not want to have |italic|position, title, profession|-| (no matter how you call it) to be on my card, so I have only previously designed |bold|horizontal logo|-| on |italic|front-side|-|. The most important contact information is on |italic|back-side|-|.

images.alt: Front an Back sides of the Business Card

projectDescription.content: I created brand for my mother as for financial services provider. I defined 2 main colors, created logo, designed 2-side business card.
I created 2 versions of logo: |bold|dark & light|-| (based on defined brand colors).
After finishing logo I switched to |bold|business card|-| design.

images.alt: Front an Back sides of the Business Card

projectDescription.content: I created logo & business card for financial consultant from Ukraine. I defined 2 main colors, created logo, designed 2-side business card and created graphic candle-chart as visual element for business card. Candle-chart displays that person is connected with advanced financial operations.
I created 2 versions of logo: |bold|dark & light|-| (based on defined brand colors).
After finishing logo I switched to |bold|business card|-| design.
